metadata.title: CVE-2024-27428 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netrom: Fix data-races around sysctl_netrom_network_ttl_initialiserWe need to protect the reader reading the sysctl value because thevalue can be changed concurrently.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
